Module jBomberman
Package controller

Class FactoryDecoratedNPC

java.lang.Object
controller.FactoryDecoratedNPC
All Implemented Interfaces:
MyJBombermanFormat
public class FactoryDecoratedNPC extends Object implements MyJBombermanFormat
This factory contains all the information and methods needed to create non playable character set for any level of the game.
